content:
# Payment - AGH e-Shop

URL: https://sklep.agh.edu.pl/en/platnosci,21
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:36

Home Page
  /

Payment

Payment

Payment for the ordered items should be made within 7 business days from the date of receiving an email with the confirmation of the order. Payment is considered complete once the money has been credited to the Store’s bank account. Only then the order will be prepared for dispatch or personal collection. In case no payment has been received, the order will be cancelled and treated as the Customer’s withdrawal from the purchase contract. The Seller will inform the Customer about the order cancellation by means of electronic mail. 

The AGH University Online Store does not accept payments in cash.

Accepted methods of payment: 

bank-to-bank transfer:
In the transfer details, please provide the following information: the Customer’s name and surname, and the order number.
Payments should be made to the bank account of the AGH University Online Store (08 1240 2294 1111 0010 6980 9131, Bank Pekao S.A., Krakow). 
If you intend to transfer money from a non-Polish bank account, you will need to precede the Store’s bank account number with the letters “PL”, as well as provide the BIC/SWIFT code of the Bank, in which the Store’s bank account is held (Bank Pekao S.A.)

online payment offered by eCard SA.  

Available methods of payment:  

Debit and credit cards:
